subject: Re: svn commit: samba-web r1126 - in trunk/history: .
body:
looks like the "extra" letter was actually supposed to replace the final
"a" in "Vulnerabilita" to make it "Vulnerability"

jerry@samba.org wrote:
> Author: jerry
> Date: 2007-06-11 16:50:14 +0000 (Mon, 11 Jun 2007)
> New Revision: 1126
> 
> WebSVN: http://websvn.samba.org/cgi-bin/viewcvs.cgi?view=rev&root=samba-web&rev=1126
> 
> Log:
> remove random letter that snuck in somehow
> Modified:
>    trunk/history/security.html
> 
> 
> Changeset:
> Modified: trunk/history/security.html
> ===================================================================
> --- trunk/history/security.html	2007-06-08 16:53:45 UTC (rev 1125)
> +++ trunk/history/security.html	2007-06-11 16:50:14 UTC (rev 1126)
> @@ -24,7 +24,7 @@
>      
>          14 May 2007
>          patch for Samba 3.0.24
> -        Remote Command Injection Vulnerabilita (Updated June 5 to include missing "c" character from INCLUDE list).y
> +        Remote Command Injection Vulnerabilita (Updated June 5 to include missing "c" character from INCLUDE list).
>          Samba 3.0.0 - 3.0.25rc3
>          CVE-2007-2447
>          Announcement
>
